Summary: Hovering changing lights due east star shaped, Multi colored
divs: Sighting DetailsLight observed due east, thought first it was helicopter over Interstate Highway but many varied lights and completely stationary for long period of time. distinct color variations behind whitish light observed for aprox. 1 hour with no movement only color change yellow, green, Blue, Red. still out there doing its thing. colors more distinct with binoculars. will check again later.
